description.plain:
Broken Back (aka Jérôme Fagnet) is a French singer and composer based in Paris. At twenty-two years old, he suffered from a severe back injury which prevented him from moving, hence his stage name.

Because of the indie feel of his songs, Broken Back has gained many fans in other countries. Some even compare his music to Milky Chance.

His most popular song, “Halcyon Birds,” spread worldwide and went platinum in a year.

body.plain:
Broken Back (aka Jérôme Fagnet) is a French singer and composer based in Paris. At twenty-two years old, he suffered from a severe back injury which prevented him from moving, hence his stage name.

Because of the indie feel of his songs, Broken Back has gained many fans in other countries. Some even compare his music to Milky Chance.

His most popular song, “Halcyon Birds,” spread worldwide and went platinum in a year.

description.plain:
This is Broken Back’s first official song release and the first song on his debut EP “Dear Misfortune, Mother of Joy”.
“Halcyon Birds” extends a metaphor about the second chance, inspired by the eponymous Greek myth.

songs.embed_content: Read “Halcyon Birds” by Broken Back on Genius
songs.title: Halcyon Birds

body.plain:
This is Broken Back’s first official song release and the first song on his debut EP “Dear Misfortune, Mother of Joy”.
“Halcyon Birds” extends a metaphor about the second chance, inspired by the eponymous Greek myth.

songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Once we sailed across the seas
Yet some doubts tainted winds blew
Once our tale you believed in
Yet these doubts have drowned your soul

Man plans and god laughs
This is what I've learnt from you
Once we stood just like two halves
Yet these doubts have drowned your soul

[Chorus]
I wonder will we be
Up to the legend once we heard
I wonder if we will see
Each other flying as two halcyon birds


[Verse 2]
For a while, I thought you were lost
In the depths where lovers meet
One last smile and fingers crossed
Is how you left the lovers seat

[Chorus]
I wonder will we be
Up to the legend once we heard
I wonder if we will see
Each other flying as two halcyon birds

[Bridge]
I've tried to make them burn and let them all fade away
Yet these memories remain, stuck in my bones and my brain
I've tried to make them burn and let them all fade away
Yet these memories remain, stuck in my bones and my brain
I've tried to make them burn and let them all fade away
Yet these memories remain, stuck in my bones and my brain
I've tried to make them burn and let them all fade away
Yet these memories remain, stuck in my bones and my brain

[Chorus]
I wonder will we be
Up to the legend once we heard
I wonder if we will see
Each other flying as two halcyon birds

description.plain:
This is Broken Back’s second official song release and the second song on his debut EP “Dear Misfortune, Mother of Joy”.
“Happiest Man On Earth” depicts the consciousness of a stealth second of happiness.

body.plain:
This is Broken Back’s second official song release and the second song on his debut EP “Dear Misfortune, Mother of Joy”.
“Happiest Man On Earth” depicts the consciousness of a stealth second of happiness.

songs.lyrics:
Ooooh...

[Verse 1]
I’ll make it quick for you to know
Splashing my feelings is not what I’m the best at
I’ve never told you many things that I should
The words are on my lips, it’s time to tell you the truth

I'll make it quick for you to know
Splashing my feelings is not where I'm the best at
I've never told you many things that I should
The words are on my lips, it's time to tell you the truth

[Chorus]
I belong to the roads now,
Coming home to my old town
This pretty smile on this pretty face,
I think I am the happiest man on earth

I belong to the roads now,
Coming home to my old town
This pretty smile on this pretty face,
I think I am the happiest man on earth

Ooooh...
I think I am the happiest man on earth
Ooooh...

[Verse 2]
Will you let me empty
The pain in your eyes?
The chains in your heart
Gonna break it with my arms

Whenever you feel sad,
In times of dark days
Going through a bad patch
Please come take my hand

I care too much about you
To let you get drowned
I’ll always stay around,
Whenever you hit the ground

[Chorus]
I belong to the roads now,
Coming home to my old town
This pretty smile on this pretty face,
I think I am the happiest man on earth

I belong to the roads now,
Coming home to my old town
This pretty smile on this pretty face,
I think I am the happiest man on earth

I think I am the happiest man on earth

This pretty smile on this pretty face,
I think I am the happiest man on earth
I belong to the roads now,
Coming home to my old town
This pretty smile on this pretty face,
I think I am the happiest man on earth
I belong to the roads now,
Coming home to my old town
This pretty smile on this pretty face,
I think I am the happiest man on earth
I belong to the roads now,
Coming home to my old town
This pretty smile on this pretty face,

[Outro]
I think I am the happiest man on earth
I think I am the happiest man on earth
I think I am the happiest man on earth
I think I am the happiest man on earth

Hey!

We are the young souls, proud to be so
Every day
Tell them we are, tell them we are
We’re on the way

We won’t stop, we won’t stop growing
Every day
Tell them we are, tell them we are
We’re on the way

We are the young souls, proud to be so
Every day
Tell them we are, tell them we are
We’re on the way

We’re walking through the lands

Romantic adventurers, we seek to discover
What the world has to hide

A thousand miles away
We’ve traveled to, so far to play
We’ve put our fears aside

A thousand miles away
We’ve traveled to, so far to play
We’ve come to sing out loud
A thousand miles from home

Hey

We are the young souls, proud to be so
Every day
Tell them we are, tell them we are
We’re on the way

We won’t stop, we won’t stop growing
Every day
Tell them we are, tell them we are

songs.embed_content: Read “Seven Words” by Broken Back on Genius
songs.title: Seven Words
songs.lyrics:
Seven words that made him change his mind
Seven words for you to left him behind
With simple pleasures just to keep him blind
He should think about it, he should think about it

[Chorus]
Hey ya
I heard you sing the song
We used to endless play
When we were cloud nine
Hey ya
I heard you sing the song
We used to endless play
When we were cloud nine

[Verse1]
It took a kiss to make it happen
It took some fun to make it real
After some nights he said: "Listen."
"No feelings, just fun, is that clear? "
It took a kiss to make it happen
It took some fun to make it real
After some nights he said: "Listen."
"No feelings, just fun, is that clear? "

[Chorus]
Hey ya
I heard you sing the song
We used to endless play
When we were cloud nine
Hey ya
I heard you sing the song
We used to endless play
When we were cloud nine

[Verse 2]
It took a thought to make him weak and
In the morning she used to leave fast
After two weeks he said: "Listen"
"Would you stay here for the breakfast? "
It took a thought to make him weak and
In the morning she used to leave fast
After two weeks he said: "Listen"
"Would you stay here for the breakfast? "

He was cursed, no doubt felt weaker
And couldn't believe it was real
After two months he said "Listen"
"I got to tell you how I feel"

She has waited for this lesson
And to make her crystal clear
With a smile she said "Well listen"
"No feelings, just fun, is that clear? "

[Chorus]
Hey ya
I heard you sing the song
We used to endless play
When we were cloud nine
Hey ya
I heard you sing the song
We used to endless play
When we were cloud nine

songs.lyrics:

I don't know where we goin'
But I do know that I love you
More than anybody else
I don't know what we doin'
I don't know where we goin'
But I do know that I love you
More than anybody else

[Post-Chorus]
Anybody else
Anybody else

[Verse 2]
You know I was afraid as the time goes by, and
What the hell, baby, here's some lies
But I wanna grow old with you, my love
'Cause I have you now, I have you now

Don't you hear I'll be by your side?
When I ask myself if I'm afraid to die
I say, but I'm in love not long enough

I don't know where we goin'
But I do know that I love you
More than anybody else

[Bridge]

[?] but me, eh

Tell me what could I had done

[Chorus]
I don't know what we doin'
I don't know where we goin'
But I do know that I love you
More than anybody else
I don't know what we doin'
I don't know where we goin'
But I do know that I love you

[Outro]
Than anybody else

songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I feel it inside, say you're feeling it too
I know you're hiding, wait for the light of the moon

[Pre-Chorus]
I'mma pull you in, you're close to me, feel your body on mine
Show you how it's supposed to be, light ya fire

[Chorus]
'Cause I know you hear this ra-ta-ta-ta-da
Running fast but it don’t even matter
The night gonna catch you before you get home
Soon as you feel it you're losing control
Trust me, the night gonna catch you and all
Bet you can feel it, you're losing control

[Verse 2]
The stars are shining and now you're shining bright too
There's no denying, one only thing left to do

[Pre-Chorus]
I'mma pull you in, you're close to me, feel your body on mine
Show you how it's supposed to be, light ya fire

[Chorus]
'Cause I know you hear this ra-ta-ta-ta-da
Running fast but it don’t even matter
The night gonna catch you before you get home
Soon as you feel it you're losing control
Trust me, the night gonna catch and all
Bet you can feel it, you're losing control

[Instrumental Bridge]

[Pre-Chorus]
I'mma pull you in, you're close to me, feel your body on mine
Show you how it's supposed to be, light ya fire

[Chorus]
'Cause I know you hear this ra-ta-ta-ta-da
Running fast but it don’t even matter
The night gonna catch you before you get home
Soon as you feel it you're losing control
Trust me, the night gonna catch you and all
Bet you can feel it, you're losing control

'Cause I know you hear this ra-ta-ta-ta-da
Running fast but it don’t even matter
The night gonna catch you before you get home
Soon as you feel it you're losing control
Trust me, the night gonna catch you and all
Bet you can feel it, you're losing control

songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I don't know where this train goes
And I don't like doing what I'm told
But every time that I get low
In my chest this small light glows

[Chorus]
'Cause day by day, I take and take my time
Whatever comes my way, it won't be a waste in rhymes
Day by day, I take and take my time
Whatever comes my way, not afraid to fall and try

[Verse 2]
I push my luck on the edge for fun
Life's too short, there's no need to rush
Once you told me you better run
But two years later I still don't understand

[Chorus]
'Cause day by day, I take and take my time
Whatever comes my way, it won't be a waste in rhymes
Day by day, I take and take my time
Whatever comes my way, not afraid to fall and try

Day by day, I take and take my time
Whatever comes my way, it won't be a waste in rhymes
Day by day, I take and take my time
Whatever comes my way, not afraid to fall and try

songs.title: Breathe Slow
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
I know you are
Smiling just to stop
Tears from falling but
Please go let them drop
I know you are fighting
Since you were born
See how strong you became
See how strong all alone

[Pre-Chorus]
When you're lost, faded soul and trust
Dancing demons in dust, watch them fall apart
When you don't know if you're strong enough to do so
Take my hand, real slow, watch them fall apart

[Chorus]
Breathe slow, breathe slow
Shadows on the wall 'cause
This small light glows
Don't let the cold night
Breathe slow, breathe slow
Shadows on the wall 'cause
This small light glows
Don't let the cold night
Don't let the cold night falls
Don't let the cold night falls

[Pre-Chorus]
When you're lost, faded soul and trust
Dancing demons in dust, watch them fall apart
When you don't know if you're strong enough to do so
Take my hand, real slow, watch them fall apart

[Chorus]
Breathe slow, breathe slow
Shadows on the wall 'cause
This small light glows
Don't let the cold night
Breathe slow, breathe slow
Shadows on the wall 'cause
This small light glows
Don't let the cold night
Don't let the cold night falls
Don't let the cold night falls

[Bridge]
Has power over you
Just what you gave power to
But I Hope we're stronger than that
I got to see her
Has power over you
Just what you gave power to
But I hope we're better than broken dreams

[Chorus]
Breathe slow, breathe slow
Shadows on the wall 'cause
This small light glows
Don't let the cold night
Breathe slow, breathe slow
Shadows on the wall 'cause
This small light glows
Don't let the cold night
Don't let the cold night falls
Don't let the cold night falls

[Outro]
Breathe slow, breathe slow
Breathe slow, breathe slow
Breathe slow, breathe slow
Breathe slow, breathe slow

songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
And the sooner the better
And the sooner the better

[Chorus]
You've never crossed the line
Don’t you wanna to see what's behind
But you'd better make up your mind
About the ocean
You’ve never crossed the line
Don't you wanna to see what's behind
But you'd better make up your mind
And the sooner the better

[Post-Chorus]
And the sooner the better
And the sooner the better

[Verse 1]
I wanna see the world
Don't wanna do it on my own
So pack your things
We ain't coming home
For a little while
And if we leave tonight
Would you have time to say goodbye
Grab all you need
Don't wanna leave
Nothing behind

[Chorus]
You've never crossed the line
Don’t you wanna to see what’s behind
But you'd better make up your mind
About the ocean
You’ve never crossed the line
Don't you wanna to see what's behind
But you'd better make up your mind
And the sooner the better

[Post-Chorus]
And the sooner the better
And the sooner the better

[Verse 2]
Let’s take a subway to the ocean
With no regrets we're just keep going
And we can fake wolf cries, say we're sick in bed
We still got dreams inside our heads
We still got dreams inside unread

[Chorus]
You've never crossed the line
Don't you wanna to see what's behind
But you'd better make up your mind
About the ocean
You've never crossed the line
Don't you wanna to see what's behind
But you'd better make up your mind
And the sooner the better

[Post-Chorus]
And the sooner the better
And the sooner the better
And the sooner the better
